subtitle: Your marketplace for digital excellence:
typedTitle1: where buyers and sellers thrive in the digital marketplace.
travelsTile: Whatever you need to wherever you go
sportsTile: To hell the rest - be the best

homeSubtitle1: Celebrating individuality and diverse needs, our marketplace offers a boundless array of options to fulfill every desire, ensuring that whatever you seek, you'll find it here with ease and satisfaction.
homeSubtitle2: Embrace convenience and flexibility: Our marketplace is always ready to serve your needs, anytime, anywhere.
homeSubtitle3: Embracing diversity: Our marketplace welcomes all, offering something for every unique taste, preference, and identity.
loginSubtitle: Here, you can create an account not only for your own usage, but also create an account for your company.
